name: Dicity
description:
Use the dice Fortuna hands to you

Build a lovely little town with them! And if Fortuna is not so fond of you, use your infrastructure to give your luck a little boost.

A strong Bond

The mayor has a big duty to fulfill and many family members to disappoint. So - as it always is - he is very willing to hand all his work so someone more organized -  like you. In the meantime he will follow his REAL passion - playing Yahtzee.

How to Play

Each round you will be given a set of dice, which you can use to expand your city. Depending on your city you can modify the dice before you place them. Reach the Dicington productivity quota in the 10 given turns, or Mayor Dicington won't be able to practice Yahtzee anymore.

But be watchful of your cities needs and the interaction between clusters, otherwise the Diceington family will catch wind of your deal with the mayor before you can say Yahtzee.

A small Hint

Click on the mayor to get helpful Yahtzee tips and general good advice. Also: Building clusters (same category of building + same number horizontally or vertically placed next to each other) is key!

Two developers had a lot of fun making this for GMTK 2022

Made with Love, Lakritze, Club Mate and Godot ❤️
